messages.content:
Hey <@1387738696815607878> , you'll want to make it a list as HFIDs are a list.

```
---
apiVersion: infrahub.app/v1
kind: Object
spec:
  kind: FirewallAddressGroup
  data:
    - name: addressgroup1
---
apiVersion: infrahub.app/v1
kind: Object
spec:
  kind: FirewallAddress
  data:
    - name: address1
      value: 10.0.1.0/24
      address_group:
        - ["addressgroup1"]
```

When trying to load objects into infrahub I am getting the following error, even though the addressgroup1 object is being loaded and is visible in the GUI:
```
> infrahubctl object load objects/firewall.yml
[15:51:47] INFO     Created node: addressgroup1                                                                                      
['FirewallAddressUpsert'] Unable to find the node addressgroup1 / FirewallAddressGroup in the database.
```
Here is the schema:
```
nodes:
  - name: AddressGroup
    namespace: Firewall
    label: Address Groups
    human_friendly_id:
      - name__value
    display_labels:
      - name__value
    attributes:
      - name: name
        kind: Text
        unique: true
    relationships:
      - name: address
        label: Addresses
        peer: FirewallAddress
        cardinality: many
        optional: true
        kind: Attribute

  - name: Address
    namespace: Firewall
    label: Addresses
    human_friendly_id:
      - name__value
    display_labels:
      - name__value
    attributes:
      - name: name
        kind: Text
        unique: true
        label: Name
      - name: value
        kind: Text
        label: Address Value
    relationships:
      - name: address_group
        label: Address Groups
        peer: FirewallAddressGroup
        cardinality: many
        optional: true
        kind: Attribute
```
Here is the objects yml file:
```
---
apiVersion: infrahub.app/v1
kind: Object
spec:
  kind: FirewallAddressGroup
  data:
    - name: addressgroup1
---
apiVersion: infrahub.app/v1
kind: Object
spec:
  kind: FirewallAddress
  data:
    - name: address1
      value: 10.0.1.0/24
      address_group:
        - addressgroup1
```
Could you please let me know where I am going wrong?

Thank you ðŸ˜€
